comment: For some reason, seven suggestions were not included in poll results.

data.suggestion: Flora cat kneading
World War II Pinup: Clovis dressed as German chancellor.
Meave wakes up in place of Niko from oneshot
Zen and Nat as the Elrich brothers
Older Maddie and Maeve sharing their first kiss together, with Maddie getting flustered afterwards.
Adira and Adelaide in bikinis at the poolside, enjoying some sunshine while Maddie and Maeve are playing in the pool.
Sythe dreams of himself as a sultan of a distant land, and keidran Nibbly and Maren are his harem girls. One feeds him grapes while the other dances, both wearing face veils, jewels and their fur.
Magpie meets Nibbly, but Nibbly tries to steal some of her nick-nacks
Wolf Raine opens up a magic book only to find a comic book inside. The comic itself is horrible and she drops it while running away screaming
The Explorers invite the fluffy Keidran and Basitin into a human only bath. No more fluff. Explorer sad.
Kat in a Maid outfit
Mike going out for a picnic with the Wolf and Coyote ladies
Wolf Raine on all fours with her tail wagging in the air, waiting for Red to throw a stick so she can fetch it.
Raine/Rose AU: Saria and Rose take young Raine to a library for the first time.
Walking in on Clovis Part 3: Brutus helps Clovis’s “sister” bathe, much to Clovis’s (supposed) discomfort
Natani also carrying Keith across a river to keep his armor dry, but find the deep end.
Flora and Tiger trace as demonic version of themselves
The cast plays a board game they found in the estate, not realizing it was made by Nora and has more magical effects than Jumanji
WW2: Tigres Trace Wearing a US Army Air Force Dress uniform while sitting on the wings of a P-40
Page 1, but with Natani in Trace's position.
Trace and Flora slow dancing in 1930’s style clothes.
In the bunny village Mike is bowled over, bunny piled and questioned by a small fluffle of curious young bunnies.
Human King Adelaide swimsuit pinup
Trace dressed as Tanjiro and Flora dressed Nezuko from the anime demon slayer
Laura lighting the lamp of a lighthouse
Pirate Zen and first mate Kat capture Clovis and Brutus
Flora in autumn: a portrait of Flora dressed for cool weather among the leaves
Natani as John Wick
the main cast dressed as the cast of bravely default. trace=tiz, flora=agnes, keith =ringabel, Natani=Edea
Keith and Natani, snuggled up together and sipping hot drinks, watching the rain outside
Chibi noodle dragon Maddie, quips from Mom and Natani
Twokinds Stargate SG-1 (Trace as O’Neill, Flora as Carter, Keith as Jackson, Natani as Teal’c)
King Adelaide's coronation
Natani and Zen dressed as Sam and Dean respectively from Supernatural with Natani using Sam's demon blood powers and Zen using the Colt pistol.
Scythe presents a ring box to Maren, unbeknownst to Scythe mrs Nibbly replaced its contents with an acorn.

Nora forced to embarrass herself by acting like a dog after a spell backfires. The dog has hijacked the dragon's body and is innocently taking it for a joyride while she's trapped in the passenger seat.
Adelaide and Maddie's Father: Forbidden First Date edition. Maddie's father sneaking his way into the castle to see Adelaide

A rainforest tiger huntress makes first contact by sneaking into a human tavern in the night. The scared female owner tries repeatedly to whack her with a broom whilst the huntress is trying to calm her down.
Adelaide demolishing a tower by lifting it
Kat sees a dream in which she is pregnant and cries after waking up.
Nora The Magnificent, Nora decides to put on a cheesey magic act, rabbits out of hats, card tricks, etc. Everyone is confused why she isn't showing off her actual magic prowess
Sythe’s personal thoughts on maren
Raine and Red (both Halfkind forms) share a heartwarming kiss under a waterfall.
Natani and Keith as Roman Gladiator champions.
Laura as Yuna and Lady Nora as Valefor in “I can fly” scene from Final Fantasy X
What if Laura was Grand Templar instead of Trace?
Back to School - The TK gang in their back to school clothes, getting ready to get on the bus.
Lynn and Sealeen finish dinner and have a kiss
Alternate Universe: Grand Templar Trace leads a massive assault against King Adelaide, forcing his way to the castle.
Maeve teaches Kathrin how to properly play with a ball of yarn since she is only half feline. Continuation of “Kitty Kat” sketch.
Maren and Scythe body swap while dancing. Maren finds the fur is really itchy, and Scythe feels naked without fur.
Nora pulls Red and Sythe into Raine's mind, where they are made to act out one of her fanfictions, one that stars only them...
Karen meets young Maeve, she shouts "Look at the cute little kitty! can we keep her?" While giving her a super tight bear hug. Maren is heard from outside the panel, "No Karen we cannot keep Maeve."
Sam and Colin find themselves swapping species. Colin is flustered by the new development while Sam gets into the change.
Love Talk part 2. Kat asks Nora about her relationship with Trace: "I heard you tried to seduce him. Are you in love with him?" And Nora explains how actually she relates to him.
Kat and Zen eat spaghetti, as in the scene from "Lady and the Tramp" by Disney.
Flora accidentally sits on a small canine Keidran.
Eris is traveling to catch several critters to fulfill their frankenstein project. But she has to be careful how she was not allowed to get caught by the Templars back then (part 1)
Kat removes clothes from her puppets to make way for new outfits. Meanwhile in the Oasis Room some people on the beach suddenly feel compelled to get naked.
Mike kisses Evals who is reluctant at first but then gets more into it (both male)
Zen carrying a sleeping Raine on his back, taking her back home after a fun time at a rock concert.
Sythe make Nibbly a small rickety wooden house
Sythe with a scythe
Look! Ribbons! Only with Cat Nora... and chains. Magical floaty chains.
Kat’s rollercoaster of emotion as she tries to thread a needle.
Flora gets trapped in a conversation with Trace and Raine who are nerding out about magic.
A Guys-To-Girls night with Zen and Sythe, but femZen has already had a few drinks and can't recognize femSythe.
Kat gets a sensual 'welcome back' massage from her masseuse mentor that taught her everything she knows
Zen reference sheet
Maren is showing support for Raine by wearing a collar in cat keidran form. Sythe decides to use the opportunity to tease/mess with her.
Keidran Nibbly nose booping Sythe. By that I mean nose to nose.
Fox Trace
Kat’s New hand shaken milkshake recipe is a hit with the local guys. Eric dose not understand why.
Kat dancing in the pale moonlight; inksplotch style
Natani in a groom outfit (tuxedo, suit, etc) Carrying his "bride" (Keith in a wedding dress) bridal style, having him very embarrassed
A scene where we see Natani through Keith’s eyes. Something like “no matter Natani’s faults, through Keith’s eyes they are perfect”
TK characters as Fellowship of the Ring.
Karate Kat: All the combat training Natani gave Kat has finally paid off and the two of them spring into picture perfect jumping kicks, worthy of an 80's training montage!
Trace and Saria dancing at a Templar ball
Madelyn going through the full metal jacket basic training
Sythe in regalia providing diplomatic relations "advice" to the Basitin trio. Lynn is studiously taking notes, but the other two are more suspicious.
Trace's promise: After another nightmare about Flora, he holds his sleeping fiancée and unborn child, whispering into her ear that he'll never let anyone hurt them. Not even himself.
The Male Cartographers reached the Minor Feline Territory to finding many other Feline Keidran with some intrigue with them, and some "vary" interested in the men with the Tiger noble guarding them.
Genderswapped Nora and flora fighting over female trace.
Plain gray-white cat version of Flora (as was originally conceived)
Tiger Trace and Keith end up wearing control collars. Flora sees this and decides to make them her servants.
While shopping at the market a young Rose gets hit on by a handsome male fox and a beautiful female cat keidrian who then begin to fight over her.
